a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball III

p.k: The Egg / The Triangle / The Money Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Richard has lost all of the familyâ€™s money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash.
